alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 30 at 12:37AM MDT until August 30 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Montana... Northeastern Hill County in north central Montana... * Until 115 AM MDT. * At 1235 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Havre, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Havre, Chinook, Lohman, Lloyd, and Zurich. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A wind gust to 63 mph was observed at the Havre Airport. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
